verses.name: Matthew 5:1
verses.text: And seeing the multitudes, he went up into a mountain: and when he was set, his disciples came unto him:

verses.name: Matthew 5:2
verses.text: And he opened his mouth, and taught them, saying,

verses.name: Matthew 5:3
verses.text: Blessed are the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

verses.name: Matthew 5:4
verses.text: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted.

verses.name: Matthew 5:5
verses.text: Blessed are the meek: for they shall inherit the earth.

verses.name: Matthew 5:6
verses.text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled.

verses.name: Matthew 5:7
verses.text: Blessed are the merciful: for they shall obtain mercy.

verses.name: Matthew 5:8
verses.text: Blessed are the pure in heart: for they shall see God.
